title: Your Shop RP Bug
body: http://imgur.com/gallery/yup7p       The numbers are all wrong.   1855 Rp for jade dragon wukong??

replies.body: Do you own any of those champions? If not, then that would be why. If you don't own the champion, then the deals will include the champion, which means that the price will be a bit higher.
Correct - if ya don't own the champions, the shop shows the price for both. If you buy the champion separately for IP / RP, the shop will then only display the discounted skin. ^-^
